text: @toryboypierce @COVID19 @MattHancock Not you as well. 81k tested yesterday v  52k day before. Do you really think that @MattHancock is going to slaughter himself on the lectern tomorrow night whilst we’re all on countdown to start of weekend where we drink double out daily weekday quantities
